messages.subject: Re: unschooling goal....was granparents
messages.msgSnippet: Some need more help than others in ... I generally find that I need to think things through more whe nthe word *should* comes out.....where is this from?
messages.messageBody:
<snip>Some need more help than others in
> arriving at a point where they can be entirely self-driven and self-
> directed. **And that *should* be the ultimate goal.** To help our
> children become self-sufficient.
>
> Bridget
I generally find that I need to think things through more whe nthe word
*should* comes out.....where is this from? You, your ideas about what's
right and best?

For me, I hope my children grow into loving, kind interdependent persons.
The idea of 'self sufficiency' seems ..... 'off' base for me and mine.
Susan....hopelessly behind from celebrating the holidays.....I'll try to
keep my keyboard quiet and just try to read and catch up :-)
